entry.def: A signboard is a piece of wood which has been painted with pictures or words and which gives some information about a particular place, product, or event.

example.ex: The signboard outside the factory read 'baby milk plant'.
example.tran: 工厂外的招牌上写着“婴儿乳品厂”。

means.word_mean: 1. structure displaying a board on which advertisements can be posted;

auth_sentence.content: We invite guests, and we put a signboard out front inviting anyone who just wants to come in off the street.
